column1: '''''The Lore and Language of Schoolchildren''''' is a scholarly work on childhood culture, derived from folklorists [[wikipedia:Iona and Peter Opie
column2: Iona and Peter Opie]]'s collecting of rhymes, games, riddles in the United Kingdom during the 1950s. The discussion of <nowiki>'</nowiki>''Fains or fainites''<nowiki>'</nowiki> (p. 151) includes quotations from a [[Letter to Iona and Peter Opie
column3: 1951 letter]] by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
